intro: Psychotria hollandiae var. whitei, commonly known as the White's Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of white or pale yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in rainforest understories. Due to its unique appearance and habitat, it is of interest to botanists and conservationists.
